Different Crime.Crime Name: Failure to disclose material facts under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act

misrepresentation_or_fraud: omission of failed refugee claim and removal from the USA

Different Crime.Crime Name: Withholding Material Facts Relating to Immigration Application
legal_basis: subsection 40(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
decision_outcome: application for judicial review was dismissed
evidence_assessment: induced an error in the Act's administration

relationship_genuineness: claimed he was the biological child of her Canadian sponsor
cause_of_action: false claim about her son's paternity

procedural fairness letter raised concerns but did not clarify material misrepresentations

standard_of_review: adequacy of Officer's reasons and procedural fairness
judicial review of the immigration officer’s decision
decision_outcome: application allowed, case remanded for reconsideration

Different Crime.Crime Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act

birth certificate did not claim biological parenthood

legal_basis: section 40 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act

decision_reasoning: no material change in circumstances since RPD decision

faced discrimination as a Russian immigrant
military service alone does not constitute persecution
no evidence shows Israeli military activity violated international standards
applicant did not object to service as a conscientious objector
conclusion_outcome: application for refugee status is dismissed
no errors by the Board would change the outcome

certification of a legal question was warranted
result_of_case: no serious question of general importance certified

evidence_assessment: discrepancies between stated duties and employer confirmation

state_protection: adequate state protection in Mexico City

presumption of state protection absent clear contrary evidence

legal_basis: Relevant questions in discovery must advance a party's case or damage the opponent's

decision_outcome: Plaintiff granted limited additional oral discovery; costs awarded proportionally
